“The Basics, Annual Crops, Marketing, and More!”

Online School with Lisa Mason Ziegler

$695 – Lifetime Access. Risk-Free Guarantee.

settings.title: Turn Your Passion for Flowers into a Profitable Business!
settings.text: Dreaming of starting your own flower farm, or you’re struggling to grow a flower farming business that truly flourishes—welcome! You’re in the right place.

settings.title: Earning Potential
settings.text: Enjoy the freedom to scale your earnings by expanding at your pace. Flower farmers report average sales of $25,000 to $30,000 per acre.

settings.title: Low Startup Costs
settings.text: Start small with minimal upfront investment. Lisa still doesn’t own a greenhouse after 25+ yrs farming!

settings.title: Work from Home
settings.text: Benefit from the convenience of running your business right from your own backyard. Create a work-life balance that suits you.

settings.title: Connect with Your Community
settings.text: Build relationships with local florists, markets, and customers who value fresh, sustainably grown flowers.

settings.title: Be Your Own Boss
settings.text: Make decisions, set goals, and grow your business at your own pace without answering to anyone but yourself.

settings.title: Start Small & Scale Up
settings.text: Begin with as little as ¼ acre, just like Lisa did, and grow your business over time.

settings.title: 6 BENEFITS of Flower Farming!

settings.custom_html: <iframe title="The Gardeners Workshop - Plantpop" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/808737254?autoplay=1&amp;dnt=1&app_id=122963" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture; clipboard-write" name="fitvid2"></iframe>
Your Instructor, Lisa Mason Ziegler

• Pioneering Urban Flower Farmer

    Lisa brings over 25 years of expertise in urban flower farming, sharing invaluable knowledge with gardeners and flower farmers alike through her innovative practices and techniques.

  • Accomplished Business Owner

    As the founder of The Gardener’s Workshop, Lisa offers comprehensive online courses and curates a selection of seeds, tools, and supplies favored on her farm.

  • Esteemed Author

    Lisa has penned three influential books on flower cultivation, including her latest work, The Cut Flower Handbook.

  • Influential National Speaker

    A sought-after presenter at national conferences, Lisa inspires the next generation of flower growers with her expert methods and passionate philosophy.

“I Need Expensive Equipment to Get Started.”
settings.title: No greenhouse or cooling systems are required! Lisa started her business with just basic gardening tools and the same simple setup we teach you in this course.

You don’t need to be a master gardener to grow beautiful, profitable flowers. Our course guides you through the basics of soil health, planting, and maintenance—all explained in simple, beginner-friendly steps.

settings.content: “It Won’t Work in My Growing Area.”
settings.title: Lisa’s techniques have been used successfully in diverse climates and regions. With our course, you’ll learn how to select the right flowers for your zone and adjust practices to thrive in your unique environment.

settings.content: “I’m Not Ready for Such a Big Commitment.”
settings.title: You don’t have to jump in with both feet. Start small with as little as a ¼ acre and gradually grow at a pace that suits your lifestyle.

settings.content: “I’m Too Busy to Take an Online Course.”
settings.title: Our self-paced format lets you learn at your convenience. Study anytime, anywhere, and revisit the material whenever you need. You’ll have lifetime access to all content.

settings.heading: 6 COMMON MYTHS Of Flower Farming — Debunked!

settings.custom_html: Exclusive Bonuses — Designed to Help You Succeed!

settings.text: Enroll today and unlock these added benefits, carefully crafted to support your growth and success:

settings.title: BONUS 1: “Cool Flowers” Field Grower’s Report
settings.text: Get access to this one-of-a-kind living report, detailing the field-growing experiences of flower farmers from all over the world. Learn what works (and what doesn’t) based on climate and conditions similar to yours!

settings.title: BONUS 2: Exclusive 2,100+ Member Facebook Community
settings.text: Connect with like-minded students, get valuable feedback, share insights, and stay up-to-date on industry trends within our supportive online community.

settings.title: BONUS 3: Access to Gallery of Our Flower Images
settings.text: Transform your online presence with high-quality images for your website, social media, or marketing materials. Elevate your brand with captivating visuals that draw in more customers.

settings.title: BONUS 4: 34 Bonus Training Videos
settings.text: Enjoy additional training videos covering everything from pinching and watering to advanced harvesting and flower conditioning techniques.

settings.title: What is the difference between School courses and Workshops?
settings.content:
Workshops vary from sixty minutes to over four hours of instruction, see individual courses for details. Each of these courses offer lots of valuable information on a specific topic that you can digest in a short amount of time and put into action right away.

School course content is much more comprehensive and covers broad topics. School courses are meant to serve as a long-term reference tool that you will use all throughout the course of your flower farming journey. Each course includes 6 modules, which each contain multiple video training sessions, instructor worksheets, and handouts, and an FAQ archive. All of the course sessions (including the FAQs) are searchable by keyword, so you can always find and go directly to the information that you need at any given time.

settings.title: May I watch more than once?
settings.content: You have lifetime unlimited access to your purchased courses.

settings.title: Do I have to watch at a certain time?
settings.content: You can watch the courses anytime at your convenience. Purchased On-Demand Courses will appear in your library immediately and will always be there for viewing.

settings.title: Do you offer course discounts?
settings.content: Yes, once you are part of our course family (owning any online school or workshop) you will be eligible for $50 off additional school courses.

settings.title: I live outside of the USA, may I purchase a course?
settings.content: Yes, our online courses are available internationally.

settings.title: Are the courses focused on growing in a specific region or area?
settings.content: No, the courses are based on methods to apply to any growing area.
